Cooldown.label: Cooldown (seconds)
Cooldown.tooltip: How long the command should go on cooldown for

Info.label: Info
Info.tooltip: This field should only be filled when using the user_specific permission.

Permission.label: Permission
Permission.tooltip: Who is able to use the command

ShowAlert.label: Show alert on screen
ShowAlert.tooltip: Activate to toggle an on screen browser source event.

btnCopy.label: Copy Overlay Path to Clipboard
btnCopy.tooltip: Copies the local file path to the overlay to the clipboard

btnStart.label: Edit File
btnStart.tooltip: Opens editor to edit the stares file - Save settings or reload script after editing
